titleStmt.title: England saved vvith a notwithstanding: represented in a sermon to the Honourable House of Commons, assembled in Parliament, Novemb. 5. 1647. The day of Thanks-giving for deliverance from the Powder-Plot. / By William Bridge, sometimes fellow of Emanuel Colledge in Cambridge, now preacher of Gods word at Yarmouth. Published by order of that House.
titleStmt.author: Bridge, William, 1600?-1670.

titleStmt.title: England saved vvith a notwithstanding: represented in a sermon to the Honourable House of Commons, assembled in Parliament, Novemb. 5. 1647. The day of Thanks-giving for deliverance from the Powder-Plot. / By William Bridge, sometimes fellow of Emanuel Colledge in Cambridge, now preacher of Gods word at Yarmouth. Published by order of that House.
titleStmt.author: Bridge, William, 1600?-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Dawlman, and are to be sold at the signe of the Crowne and Bible at Dowgate, neere Canning-street,

notesStmt.note: With an order to print dated: Die Sabbathi 6. Novemb. 1647.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
